original_text:
Legacy of Dead
La software house Play’N’Go ha deciso di inaugurare il 2020 con il botto, lanciando sul mercato una slot machine che promette di far felici anche i giocatori più difficili! Legacy of Dead è un gioco a tema egiziano, uno dei tanti in effetti, ma che grazie ad alcune funzioni speciali e a un’alta (altissima) volatilità con maxi-premio davvero da capogiro, dovrebbe distinguersi dalla miriade di altri slot machine ambientate all’ombra delle piramidi.

Il tema egiziano è sviluppato in Legacy of Dead ambientando il gioco in una sorta di antica camera funeraria, con i simboli che si rifanno alla migliore tradizione delle divinità dell’Antico Egitto.
Questa slot machine ricorda molto da vicino la sorella, sempre di casa Play’N’Go, Book of Dead, ma rispetto a questa presenta delle funzionalità in più e risulta essere, nel complesso, molto più moderna.
Il compartimento grafico di Legacy of Dead non smentisce la scelta della Play’N’Go di puntare sempre sulla massima qualità: le immagini sono splendide e unite ad animazioni in alta definizione garantiscono un’esperienza di gioco davvero incredibile.
Il range di scommesse va da soli 10 centesimi fino a 100 €, con un jackpot stellare che arriva a 25.000 volte la puntata e un ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) che si attesta su un ottimo 96,58%.
Vincere su Legacy of Dead non sarà facile, ma avrete la possibilità di portare a casa delle somme davvero interessanti!

Simboli regolari e speciali di Legacy of Dead
I simboli di Legacy of Dead sono rappresentati innanzitutto dai numeri e dalle lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, i cosiddetti “reali”. Oltre a questi abbiamo i simboli più prettamente tematici che comprendono:

Il dio falco Horus: combinazioni di 2, 3, 4 o 5 simboli pagano 0,5, 2, 8 o 60 volte la puntata
Faraone: combinazioni di 2, 3, 4 o 5 simboli pagano 0,5, 2, 8 o 60 volte la puntata
Anubi (Dio dei morti): combinazioni di 2, 3, 4 o 5 simboli pagano 0,5, 3, 30 o 160 volte la puntata
Tutankhamon: combinazioni di 2, 3, 4 o 5 simboli pagano 1, 10, 100 o 500 volte la puntata

Oltre a questi è presente inoltre il simbolo della camera funeraria che funge sia da Wild che da Scatter.

Funzionalità speciali di Legacy of Dead
La funzionalità speciale più allettante di Legacy of Dead è rappresentata dalla funzione free spins attivata grazie al simbolo della camera funeraria: se compaiono tre o più Wild/Scatter sui rulli si potranno giocare ben dieci giri gratuiti e si otterrà una vincita pari a 2, 20 o 200 volte la puntata.
Un’altra particolarità è data dalla possibilità di ottenere dei simboli speciali espandibili, fino a 9, che porteranno nuove combinazioni vincenti e permetteranno di provare a portare a casa la vincita massima pari a 25.000 volte la puntata, durante i giri gratuiti.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la percentuale RTP?

Non possiamo dire che Legacy of Dead RTP batta i record in quanto è del 94,51%. Le slot più giocate di solito hanno un RTP di circa il 96% e si avvicinano al 97% per restituire di più ai giocatori.

Legacy of Dead

The software house Play’N’Go has decided to kick off 2020 with a bang, launching a slot machine that promises to make even the most difficult players happy! Legacy of Dead is an Egyptian themed game, one of many in fact, but thanks to some special features and high (very high) volatility with a really staggering jackpot, it should stand out from the myriad of other slot machines set in the shadow of the pyramids.

The Egyptian theme is developed in Legacy of Dead by setting the game in a sort of ancient burial chamber, with symbols that refer to the best tradition of the gods of ancient Egypt. This slot machine closely resembles its sister, also from Play’N’Go, Book of Dead, but compared to it, has some extra features and is, overall, much more modern.

The graphic compartment of Legacy of Dead does not deny Play’N’Go's choice to always aim for the highest quality: the images are beautiful and, combined with high-definition animations, guarantee a truly incredible gaming experience. The range of bets goes from just 10 cents up to €100, with a stellar jackpot that reaches 25,000 times the bet and a theoretical return to player (RTP) that stands at an excellent 96.58%.

Winning on Legacy of Dead will not be easy, but you will have the chance to take home some really interesting sums!

Regular and special symbols of Legacy of Dead
The symbols of Legacy of Dead are represented first and foremost by the numbers and letters that refer to playing cards from 10 to Ace, the so-called "royals". In addition to these, we have more theme-oriented symbols that include:

The falcon god Horus: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 2, 8 or 60 times the bet
Pharaoh: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 2, 8 or 60 times the bet
Anubis (God of the Dead): combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 3, 30 or 160 times the bet
Tutankhamun: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 1, 10, 100 or 500 times the bet

In addition to these, there is also the symbol of the burial chamber that serves as both a Wild and a Scatter.

Special features of Legacy of Dead
The most enticing special feature of Legacy of Dead is represented by the free spins feature activated by the burial chamber symbol: if three or more Wild/Scatters appear on the reels, you can play up to ten free spins and win a prize equal to 2, 20 or 200 times the bet. 

Another peculiarity is given by the possibility to obtain up to 9 expandable special symbols, which will bring new winning combinations and allow you to try and win maximum prize equivalent to 25,000 times the bet, during the free spins.

We cannot say that Legacy of Dead's RTP beats any record as it is 94.51%. The most played slots usually have an RTP of around 96%, and approach 97% to give more back to players.

Review: Legacy of Dead
The software house Play'N'Go has decided to start off 2020 with a bang, launching a slot machine that promises to make even the most difficult players happy! Legacy of Dead is an Egyptian-themed game, one of many in fact, but thanks to some special features and a high (very high) volatility with an absolutely dizzying jackpot, it should stand out from the myriad of other slot machines set in the shadow of the pyramids.

The Egyptian theme is developed in Legacy of Dead by setting the game in a sort of ancient burial chamber, with symbols that refer to the best traditions of the deities of Ancient Egypt. This slot machine closely resembles its sister, also from Play'N'Go, Book of Dead, but compared to that one it has more features and is overall much more modern.

The graphics department of Legacy of Dead does not deny Play'N'Go's choice to always aim for maximum quality: the images are splendid and, joined with high-definition animations, guarantee an incredible gaming experience. The betting range goes from just 10 cents up to 100 €, with a stellar jackpot that reaches 25,000 times the bet and a theoretical return to player (RTP) that stands at an excellent 96.58%.

Winning on Legacy of Dead won't be easy, but you'll have the chance to take home some really interesting sums!

Regular and special symbols of Legacy of Dead
The symbols of Legacy of Dead are represented first and foremost by the numbers and letters that refer to the playing cards from 10 to Ace, the so-called "royals". In addition to these, we have the more typically themed symbols that include:

The hawk god Horus: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 2, 8 or 60 times the bet.
Pharaoh: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 2, 8 or 60 times the bet.
Anubis (God of the Dead): combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 0.5, 3, 30 or 160 times the bet.
Tutankhamun: combinations of 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols pay 1, 10, 100 or 500 times the bet.

In addition to these, there is also the symbol of the burial chamber, which acts as both a Wild and a Scatter.

Special features of Legacy of Dead
The most enticing special feature of Legacy of Dead is represented by the free spins feature activated thanks to the symbol of the burial chamber: if three or more Wild/Scatter appear on the reels, you can play ten free spins and receive a payout of 2, 20 or 200 times the bet.

Another unique feature is the ability to obtain up to nine expandable special symbols, which will bring new winning combinations and allow you to try and take home the maximum payout of 25,000 times the bet, during the free spins.
